metadata: (info { (description "Tavla is a race game of the Tables type which is played in Turkey. This version is documented from the Ottoman Empire, since at least the early modern period.") (rules "Backgammon board. Six-sided dice. ") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1958") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/race/escape/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Turkey, from around 1503 to 1599.") } ) (graphics { (board Style backgammon) (stackType Backgammon) })
